==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|こう|れい|yomi=o}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|こうれい|kyu=降靈}}

# [[call]]ing the [[spirit]]s of the [[dead]]
# [[spiritualism]]

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|交霊}}

====Usage notes====
Of the two spellings {{l|ja|降霊}} and {{l|ja|交霊}}, the former implies more of a sense of [[summon]]ing, and the latter more of a sense of [[exchange]] or [[communication]].

====Derived terms====
* {{ja-r|降霊術|こうれいじゅつ}}: [[necromancy]]
* {{ja-r|降霊会|こうれいかい}}: a [[séance]]

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|こうれい|kyu=降靈}}

# to [[call]], [[contact]], or [[communicate]] with the [[spirit]]s of the [[dead]], to act as a [[medium]]

====Conjugation====
{{ja-suru|こうれい}}
